new_token.description: The name of the created token

valid_for_current_ip_only.description: Optional field, if you set this parameter during token creation, then the token created will only work for the IP address that was used to create the token

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response
